name: Greedy Firefly
description:
**Introduction**

Greedy Firefly is a pixel-platformer game where the main character is a firefly and the objective of the game is to avoid spider webs, spiders and other traps to collect all the diamonds to activate the exit gate and reaching exit gate will complete the level. There is only one chance each level, failing at any moment in any stage of a level will reset all progress in that level.

**Instructions**

Use the "space" on keyboard to fly and "left" and "right" keys to move left and right.

Remember, you can only move right or left while flying, means you can move the "firefly" only when "space" key is pressed. 

You need to collect all the diamonds in order to activate exit gate, and you have to move towards the gate to complete the level.

It is advised to take as much time you can take while playing for the first time. You can replay unlocked levels and improve your score.
